Bases: pandemic_simulator.environment.interfaces.person.Person

Class that partially implements a sim person.

property assigned_locations¶

Property that returns a sequence of location ids that the person is assigned to.

Returns

A collection of LocationIDs

property at_home¶

Return True if the person is at home and False otherwise

enter_location(location_id: pandemic_simulator.environment.interfaces.ids.LocationID) → bool[source]¶

Enter a location.

Parameters

location_id – LocationID instance

Returns

True if successful else False

property home¶

Property that returns the person’s home location id.

Returns

ID of the home location

property id¶

Method that returns the id of the person.

Returns

ID of the person.

receive_regulation(regulation: pandemic_simulator.environment.interfaces.regulation.PandemicRegulation) → None[source]¶

Receive a regulation that can potentially update the person’s policy.

Parameters

regulation – a PandemicRegulation instance

reset() → None[source]¶

Reset person to its initial state.

property state¶

Property that returns the current state of the person.

Returns

Current state of the person.

step(sim_time: pandemic_simulator.environment.interfaces.sim_time.SimTime, contact_tracer: Optional[pandemic_simulator.environment.interfaces.contact_tracer.ContactTracer] = None) → Optional[NewType.<locals>.new_type][source]¶

Method that steps through the person’s policy. The step can return a NoOp to indicate no operation was carried out.

Parameters

  • sim_time – Current simulation time.

  • contact_tracer – Traces of previous contacts of the person.

Returns

Return NoOp if no operation was carried out otherwise None.
